title.label: Company deletes reviews they don’t like.

content.label:
I’m currently on a seven game loss streak against the CPU. Of course the ask if you want to buy packs to make your deck better. F*** this game and it’s devs. They purposely stack it against you so you feel like you have to buy packs.

Don’t play this game unless you plan on spending money. Even then, the odds will ALWAYS be stacked against you. You could have the best deck and somehow the CPU will always get what they need, random effects will ALWAYS effect the card you need the most, and you will NEVER get what you need. 

My last review got deleted, so yeah. You can tell they don’t give a **** about you. They just want your money.

Everything is good in the game but the freeze/heal decks have to be nerfed. Rose is way to strong of a plant hero in the game. Every game I lose as Professor Brainstorm, I lose to Rose. Can they please change the snowdrops to +1/+1 and not +2/+2. I really like the game but the game is ruined by meta decks.
I love this game it feels balanced compared to PvZ2 and 3.  The concept is creative and makes the franchise that much better.  I’m a game nerd so I know what makes a good game this is a good game
I can’t with zombies being to powerful and draw cards 24/7

This is the best game on my phone. I have used this app for countless hours and I feel like the one thing it could use is adding winstreak stars to diamond league. Also, some of the campaign levels are WAY too hard (like the Z-Mech one where all zombies get +1 health and he starts with +10 hero health). However, other than that, this is a really captivating game that I can play for hours on end! Definite 5 stars!

title.label: Good, but with a large amount of bugs

content.label: Crashes quite a bit, but otherwise really enjoyable. This game also doesn’t have enough updates or support.
Fix your stupid block meter

This game has lots of potential.  It’s really fun, and probably my favorite game right now.  The cards are very unique, and are a phenomenal inspiration for the card game I’m currently making with my friend.  However, there’s some major problems.

The biggest problem is the balancing, which is most grievous when it comes to zombies.  Some zombies are just superbly powerful for their cost, and it kind of ruins the gameplay.  The best example of this is the arm wrestling zombie; it costs 1 and is 2/2.  That’s already pretty good, but then it has a phenomenal early-game ability to get +1/+1 whenever a plant enters its lane.  I can’t think of a single one-cost plant with 3 attack.  It’s ridiculous.  Of course, you could take it out with a trick, but that’s only if you thought “I better have a trick specifically to counter this ridiculously strong card” while you got your 4 starting cards; and even then you could be unlucky and not draw a banana blaster or whatever it’s called.
Another example of this is the telephone zombie.  Yes, it’s a legendary, but all that means is that it encourages microtransactions, because the legendary cards are the only ones worth having, which makes facing off against someone with a bigger wallet just annoying.
It’s not all on the zombie side of things, though; the garlic is a massive culprit too.  It is 1/5 and only costs 1, which is already a red flag; it should be 1/3 at most!  But then, you had to throw in team-up and a vampire destroying skill.  It’s a joke.  It’s basically as good as a wall-nut in terms of defense, and is way better in terms of offense and skills.  If you’re not going to nerf its stats, you should at least make it cost 2 or more.

Speaking of nerfing, there’s a huge problem there too.  Half the time a “puzzle party” daily challenge is literally unbeatable because you’ve nerfed the zombie that stars in it and just haven’t bothered to change the daily challenge.  Not being able to have a prize you’ve worked 7 days for because of no fault of your own is quite disheartening.

I don’t mind the diamonds and microtransactions.  It’s a free mobile game after all, and diamonds are surprisingly easy to get.  The loot box system isn’t half bad either.  The little comics and the whole theme of the game are really cute and fun, as well.  But when you’re facing against someone who utterly destroys you, not because of skill, but because they had more money or free time, it’s really just sad and saps the fun out of it.  Please nerf what needs to be nerfed and fix the puzzle parties.  It would make the experience leagues more enjoyable.

This game is very fun when coming to PvP and campaign. Their are many variations of cards and characters you can play as you can also play with your friends. Their aren’t as many updates but the game still delivers that fun sensation PVZ delivers. Their is no PTW. I hope this game gets update soon of more cards.

This game is amazing but there are a few issues. People who have legendary cards in Online Battles always have the upper hand. It should be easier to obtain gems or easier to get legendary cards. Ads only give you 5 gems now as opposed to 10 a while ago, and missions should give you more gems. Getting packs is a pain and buying ten at once doesn’t guarantee a legendary. Make it easier to get gems or make it so there is a 15 or 20% chance to get them in packs. Legendary cards turn the tides of battle and making them easier to get would make it much more balanced. Another issue is the campaign mode. The “random” factor in destroying plants/ zombies, playing them in random lanes or bouncing them is completely unfair. The opposing hero always just so happens to destroy your best card or when you play it, it destroys one of their weaker cards. Fixing that would be nice. Also can there be a match creator. For example you get to make the rules of a game against a CPU like plants and zombies get +1/+1 or cards cost less every turn or draw an extra card. And one last thing. Trials and renting cards. Like every week 3 trial cards for zombies and plants like a event super rare and a legendary or something like that. And then renting, 5 gems for in uncommon 25 gems for rare 75 gems for super rare and 150 for legendary's. Once you pay it you get it for like a day or two. I hope you consider these ideas. I think it would make this better than it already is, thank you for this game.

title.label: Very good game, but I found a game breaking strategy.

content.label: If you have two Sargent Strongberrys, each in an empty lane, they will slowly whittle down your health, until you get a superblock. This can get rid of over 10 health, and it’s probably something unintended. If you want, fix it. You don’t have to.

I have been playing plants vs zombies since the first game ever ! I’ve always loved their graphics and challenges! Now plants vs zombie hero’s is my favorite! ! I read a lot of people complain about not being able to get legendary cards unless you pay , or lose due to people having broken legendary cards, I have not ever bought diamonds and I’ve won more than a few legendary cards ! I always play the challenges to earn enough diamonds and it works out for me ! I win some and I lose some ! You never know what hand you’ll be dealt! Literally! Love this game ! So much fun !
